pageContext.claim: “Could somebody at @foxnews please explain to Trump hater A.B. Stoddard (zero talent!) and @TeamCavuto, that I won every one of my debates, from beginning to end. Check the polls taken immediately after the debates. The debates got me elected. Must be Fox Board Member Paul Ryan!”
pageContext.analysis: Polls show that Hillary Clinton won the debates of the 2016 general election. Gallup found that she sweeped all three encounters with Trump.
